text: This is a list of Nick Jr. and Treehouse TV's original series, Team Umizoomi episodes. Team Umizoomi is an animated mystery fantasy musical series with a focus on preschool mathematics. It has been made available on iTunes. It first broadcast on January 25, 2010. The episode list is in broadcast order. ==Series Overview== Season Episodes First Aired Last Aired 1 20 (15 aired) January 25, 2010 December 6, 2010 ==Episodes== ===Season 1: 2010=== # Episode Title Song Notes Summary Prod code. 1 "The Kite Festival" "Shapes all over the Place" First episode to broadcast. This is the "real" 4th episode. This episode was dedicated to Billy Mays. When a gust of wind scatters the pieces of Jeannie's kite, the team must search for the pieces to. 104 2 "The Aquarium Fix-It" "Counting and Adding" Aired the same day as "The Kite Festival". Wally Gator makes a cameo appearance. The team is called in to help fix a crack in the seahorse tank at the Umi City Aquarium. 117 3 "Carnival" "Over, Under, Around and Through" The team must search the Umi City Carnival for Jake's lost stuffed animal. 105 4 "Picnic" Numbers Everywhere Milli, Geo and Bot must help their friend Anna find her missing lunchbox and thermos before they head out for a picnic. 115 5 "Super Trip to the Supermarket" N/A The team must go to the supermarket to collect the items for Tyler's favorite snack. 112 6 "Subway Heroes" N/A The team must help when Daniel's father is trapped on a broken subway train. 107 7 "The Milk Out" "We Like Milk!" When the farmer gets sick, the team must help fill Umi City's milk order. 111 8 "The Dinosaur Museum Mishap" N/A When a thunderstorm frightens the dinosaurs, the team must find them and return them to the museum before the dinosaur show. 118 9 "The Rolling Toy Parade" "Hawk Pattern Song" The team must find all the parts of Nick's lion toy before Umi City Park's rolling toy parade. 102 10 "Special Delivery" "Were On Our Way To Grandma's House" This aired as part of Nickelodeon's Heart-y Par-ty Marathon. Also, This is a love-themed episode and its airdate was on February 12, 2010, close to Valentine's Day. When Anthony forgets to put a stamp on a package for his grandmother, the team heads to the post office to make sure the package is delivered during "Just-Because-I-Love- You Day." 109 11 "Ready for Take-Off" "Snack Patterns" When Andy's plane is not able to take off, the team heads to the airport to help. 113 12 "Ice Cream Truck" Aired as part of a premiere week. Geo and his friends must search for the missing ice cream truck. 114 13 "The Wild West Toy Train Showhttps://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B003HETNPE" The gang must help Ethan after the wind blows away his ticket to the Wild West Toy Train show. 14 "The Butterfly Dance Showhttps://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B003HG1HAQ" The gang must help Sophia fix her butterfly costume in time for the Butterfly Dance show. 15 "The Elephant Sprinklerhttps://www.amazon.com/The-Elephant- Sprinkler/dp/B003I3J8OU" The team helps Kayla so she can play in the elephant sprinkler on a very hot day. 16 "Playground Heroeshttps://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B003J5FHW4" The gang helps to fix the playground so Mya and her friends can play. 17 "To The Library" The team go to the library to get Olivia's favorite book called : Goodnight purple pokladot pirate before sunset. Can the team do it? ==References== Category:Lists of animated television series episodes
title: List of Team Umizoomi episodes
